State.Author: Karandra
State.Description: This mod allows preload F4SE plugins before the game initializes.
State.Name: xSE PluginPreloader F4

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: It's like buffout but for the engine
State.Name: Buffout 4

State.Author: ElminsterAU and the xEdit Team
State.Description: FO4Edit is the Fallout 4 version of xEdit. xEdit is an advanced graphical module viewer/editor and conflict detector.
State.Name: FO4Edit

State.Author: DeadPool2099 Ha_ru and hitman47101
State.Description: This mod adds .45 Auto Pistol from Fallout New Vegas Honest Hearts DLC with unique A Light Shining In Darkness
State.Name: .45 Auto Pistol (Colt M1911)

State.Author: Meysam
State.Description:
Non Survival version

1. Adds new meds (bandages, Pain killer, Surgery kit and etc.) with new models and animations. 2. The new drugs have positive effects like restoring HP, giving you positive buffs and etc.



Survival version

1. Adds new meds (bandages, Pain killer, Surgery kit and etc.) with new models and animations.<br
State.Name: Agony

State.Author: ghussak
State.Description: This is an attempt to mix many AID mods.
State.Name: AID Reworked (mixing FROST Agony BLD SurvivalFirstAID DamnApocalypse)

State.Author: UberDan
State.Description: In Fallout 4 with FROST Survival Simulator, you are unable to plant any of the crops available in the original game; what this mod aims to achieve is to re-implement the crops from the vanilla game in a way that might make you think about the resources you're committing to them, in order to add some semblance of a balance. Now with added Fungus!
State.Name: Alternate Farming for FROST

State.Author: AnotherOne aka RetroPaladin
State.Description: Not a little patch or addon, but recreation of old style Fallout radiation. With extra things!
State.Name: AnotherOne Immersive Radiation

State.Author: pauderek
State.Description: Lowers your weapon automatically when not in combat
State.Name: Automatically Lowered Weapons

State.Author: shad0wshayd3
State.Description: Take a seat? Baka.
State.Name: Baka Wait Anywhere

Original.Name: Barefoot Footstep Extended - ESP flagged as ESL-45101-1-4-1604577874.rar

State.Author: epsadin
State.Description: This is an extended version of the amazing Barefoot Footstep mod. It adds barefoot sounds to metal, carpet and vault floor materials, as well as modifies stone / concrete and sand ones. This mod also adds barefoot sneaking sounds to all of the above. Credit goes to the user GrozaTerroristow, who is the author of the famous original mod.
State.Name: Barefoot Footstep Extended

State.Author: Moonracer
State.Description: Better Bloatflies adds the bloatfly larva syringe effect to bloatfly projectiles. If an NPC is hit with a bloatfly projectile and dies within 90 seconds there is a chance their corpse will spawn a new bloatfly. I've also increased the base damage and radiation damage of bloatfly projectiles slightly.
State.Name: Better Bloatflies

Original.Name: Better Locational Damage - Required Game Version 1.10.63 or above-3815-7-0-5-1635706243.zip

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Most realistic damage overhaul you'll find on the whole nexus. Promised.

Features:  Scripted headshots, scripted dismemberment, bleedings, stagger ,stab your enemies from behind, Shotgun knockback and more! Balanced melee and range combat. Settings holotape available to tweak features to your liking or completely disable them!
State.Name: Better Locational Damage and Optional Gameplay Overhauls

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Most realistic damage overhaul you'll find on the whole nexus. Promised.

Features:  Scripted headshots, scripted dismemberment, bleedings, stagger ,stab your enemies from behind, Shotgun knockback and more! Balanced melee and range combat. Settings holotape available to tweak features to your liking or completely disable them!
State.Name: Better Locational Damage and Optional Gameplay Overhauls

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Most realistic damage overhaul you'll find on the whole nexus. Promised.

Features:  Scripted headshots, scripted dismemberment, bleedings, stagger ,stab your enemies from behind, Shotgun knockback and more! Balanced melee and range combat. Settings holotape available to tweak features to your liking or completely disable them!
State.Name: Better Locational Damage and Optional Gameplay Overhauls

State.Author: thypride
State.Description: This mod combines the healing mechanics of Agony and Better Locational Damage and builds upon both. Finally it integrates all existing and new items into the Leveled Lists of Damn Apocalypse.
State.Name: BLD - Damn Apocalypse - Agony Patch and medical overhaul

State.Author: thypride
State.Description: This mod combines the healing mechanics of Agony and Better Locational Damage and builds upon both. Finally it integrates all existing and new items into the Leveled Lists of Damn Apocalypse.
State.Name: BLD - Damn Apocalypse - Agony Patch and medical overhaul

State.Author: thypride
State.Description: This mod combines the healing mechanics of Agony and Better Locational Damage and builds upon both. Finally it integrates all existing and new items into the Leveled Lists of Damn Apocalypse.
State.Name: BLD - Damn Apocalypse - Agony Patch and medical overhaul

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Most realistic damage overhaul you'll find on the whole nexus. Promised.

Features:  Scripted headshots, scripted dismemberment, bleedings, stagger ,stab your enemies from behind, Shotgun knockback and more! Balanced melee and range combat. Settings holotape available to tweak features to your liking or completely disable them!
State.Name: Better Locational Damage and Optional Gameplay Overhauls

State.Author: thypride
State.Description: This mod combines the healing mechanics of Agony and Better Locational Damage and builds upon both. Finally it integrates all existing and new items into the Leveled Lists of Damn Apocalypse.
State.Name: BLD - Damn Apocalypse - Agony Patch and medical overhaul

State.Author: sortitus
State.Description: Removes Blur, Bloom, HDR, and Depth of Field effects from all Imagespace Modifiers and can greatly improve FPS especially in combat situations.
State.Name: BlurKiller - Visual Pollution Remover and Performance Enhancer

State.Author: Ousnius and Caliente
State.Description: The well-known body enhancer made famous in Skyrim is back for Fallout 4 debut
State.Name: Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Enhancer -CBBE-

State.Author: kjg92
State.Description: I love cats as much as the next dude, but the Wasteland is a brutal place to live. This really simple mod adds "Cat Chops" to the cooking workbench. Cat Chops require one cat meat and one wood to make and do not do anything special other than satisfy hunger in survival mode. FROST is not required, but this mod is balanced around it.
State.Name: Cat Meat Cooking Recipe for FROST

Original.Name: Colt Delta Elite Reanimated 10MM Replacer v1.1-24472-1-1.zip

State.Author: RapDoug
State.Description: Like the 1911 platform? Want to try yet another variation for your Fallout playthrough? I have you covered!
State.Name: Colt Delta Elite Reanimated (Revival)

State.Author: jet4571
State.Description: Adds Rad Chickens and Rad Rabbits from Far Harbor to the Commonwealth.
State.Name: Commonwealth Chickens and Rabbits

State.Author: Aarwyn and ANiceOakTree
State.Description: Collection of conversions from Skyrim's KS Hairdos and ApachiiSkyHair.
State.Name: Commonwealth Cuts - KS Hairdos - ApachiiSkyHair

State.Author: MadRabbitX
State.Description: This simple mod allows you to use any consumable item in the game without picking it up, just mouse over it and press R. Works with all DLCs and any mods without any patches.
State.Name: Consume Without Pickup

State.Author: TrickyVein
State.Description: Adds a new crank-cocking crossbow weapon to the commonwealth.
State.Name: Crossbows of the Commonwealth

State.Author: TrickyVein
State.Description: Adds a new crank-cocking crossbow weapon to the commonwealth.
State.Name: Crossbows of the Commonwealth

State.Author: Xazomn
State.Description: Complete Creatures Overhaul HQ & Unique realistic Textures. All created with Photo resources & hand painted.
State.Name: Crows And Creatures

Original.Name: Damn Apocalypse - Loot Module - Better Locational Damage Patch-33812-0-9-2-1631010026.zip

State.Author: payl0ad - BabyBearington
State.Description: A modular survival overhaul, including a very in-depth loot and economy overhaul, a module for power armor scarcity and a lightweight combat plugin.
State.Name: Damn Apocalypse

Original.Name: Damn Apocalypse - Loot Module - Minutemen Watchtowers Patch-33812-0-9-2-1631010178.zip

State.Author: payl0ad - BabyBearington
State.Description: A modular survival overhaul, including a very in-depth loot and economy overhaul, a module for power armor scarcity and a lightweight combat plugin.
State.Name: Damn Apocalypse

State.Author: payl0ad - BabyBearington
State.Description: A modular survival overhaul, including a very in-depth loot and economy overhaul, a module for power armor scarcity and a lightweight combat plugin.
State.Name: Damn Apocalypse

State.Author: payl0ad - BabyBearington
State.Description: A modular survival overhaul, including a very in-depth loot and economy overhaul, a module for power armor scarcity and a lightweight combat plugin.
State.Name: Damn Apocalypse

State.Author: payl0ad - BabyBearington
State.Description: A modular survival overhaul, including a very in-depth loot and economy overhaul, a module for power armor scarcity and a lightweight combat plugin.
State.Name: Damn Apocalypse

State.Author: DNX
State.Description: 28 tattoo overlays that can be applied to a CBBE body with LooksMenu. You can choose between Pure Black or Transparent tattoos.
State.Name: DNX Body Tattoos (LooksMenu Overlays)

Original.Name: Eli's Armour Compendium - CBBE and BodySlide 1.5-22431-1-5.7z

State.Author: Elianora
State.Description: Mod ads 50 new lore-friendly armours, 20 accessories, tons of moddable colours. Institute, Settler, Wastelander, Raider, Vault suit. Both sexes. Vanilla and CBBE body, with BodySlide compatibility.
State.Name: Eli's Armour Compendium

State.Author: CrimsonLegion94
State.Description: A simple patch that fixes and adds the armors to Frost's leveled lists.
State.Name: Eli's Armour Compendium Frost Patch

Original.Name: Fallout 2287 - Gas Masks of the Wasteland - BA2-17491-1-0-8-1-1601536280.zip

State.Author: D1v1ne122
State.Description: Inspired by Metro 2033, this mod implements a new resource: gas mask filters. Humans are required to wear a gas mask while wandering the wasteland in exterior areas. Meanwhile gas masks consume filters that keep out harmful radioactive dust.
State.Name: Fallout 2287 - Gas Masks of the Wasteland

State.Author: D1v1ne122
State.Description: Inspired by mods like Frostfall and The Division, Nuclear Winter pits the Sole Survivor against the bitter cold of winter. With frosty aesthetics such as snow shaders, and visible breathing to immerse, you'll have to fight to stay warm with thick clothing and seek heat sources or fall victim to debilitating ailments and arctic conditions.
State.Name: Fallout 2287 - Nuclear Winter

Original.Name: NW Gas Masks of the Wasteland Patch-37988-1-0-0-1553545814.zip

State.Author: D1v1ne122
State.Description: Inspired by mods like Frostfall and The Division, Nuclear Winter pits the Sole Survivor against the bitter cold of winter. With frosty aesthetics such as snow shaders, and visible breathing to immerse, you'll have to fight to stay warm with thick clothing and seek heat sources or fall victim to debilitating ailments and arctic conditions.
State.Name: Fallout 2287 - Nuclear Winter

State.Author: ChaosWWW
State.Description: This mod aims to increase the quality of the colors and contrast in Fallout 4 with no performance impact.
State.Name: Fallout 4 Enhanced Color Correction

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Overhaul of the Fallout 4 map. Added list of locations and workshops including text search. Add favorite locations to fast travel with one click. Many Quality-Of-Life features like disabling the popup on empty map space click, better map zoom steps, travel and arrival time. Colored marker support. Including high-res map texture support.
State.Name: FallUI - Map

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description:
Overhaul of the sleeping and waiting menu for Fallout 4. 

Directly click on your desired wake-up time with target time buttons. See the daylight level at target time in the daytime graph and more. Interface available in all languages.
State.Name: FallUI - Sleep and Wait

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Better workbench interface optimized for PC. Bigger display size. Data columns. Comparision columns for mods. Item icon tag support. Icon menu for choosing your icon tag. Item subtitles. Autobuilding modules with zero cost. All languages included.
State.Name: FallUI - Workbench

State.Author: OverLord of Chaos
State.Description: This mod makes it so that the melee killmoves introduced with the Far Harbor DLC occur less often, so that the older killmoves can be seen more frequently.
State.Name: Far Harbor Melee Killmove Frequency Rebalance

State.Author: Lively
State.Description: Fixes LLD (Leveled List Death) records. Creatures don't drop junk and caps on death. Dogs and Mutant hounds can drop blood samples for the Brotherhood.
State.Name: Fixed Creature Death Drops

State.Author: reg2k
State.Description: Adds a photo mode to Fallout 4, accessible from the Pause menu or via hotkey.
State.Name: FO4 Photo Mode

Original.Name: FROST - 45 Auto Pistol Patch and Replacer-53316-0-990-1626551966.7z

State.Author: kjg92 and RedMetalShield
State.Description: Alters Deadpool2099's .45 Auto Pistol to adhere to FROST's various changes, fixes bugs from the base mod and provides an option to replace the vanilla Pipe Revolver.
State.Name: FROST - 45 Auto Pistol Patch and Replacer

State.Author: Titaa
State.Description:
Equipping a backpack was permanantly giving my character +X agility then was only substracting X agility if the backpack was equipped, resulting in a permanent agility gain.

This patch simply change the magic effect in FROST to a new one and makes things as it should be
State.Name: FROST - Backpack agility fix

State.Author: kjg92
State.Description: Adds sanity restoring coffee to FROST
State.Name: FROST - Coffee

Original.Name: FROST - Colt Delta Elite Replacer Patch-49026-1-0-1608675272.7z

State.Author: kjg92
State.Description: Replaces all 10mm pistols with the Colt Delta Elite while maintaining Frost's changes.
State.Name: FROST - Colt Delta Elite 10mm Replacer Patch

State.Author: undernier
State.Description: Overhaul locations originally occupied by supermutants. Modifications range from just removing fires to completely new encounters.
State.Name: FROST - Dark Calling - Supermutant Locations Overhaul

State.Author: thypride
State.Description: Brings (a fully functional) Dogmeat back to Fallout Frost. And he's doing, what dogs do best: Save your sanity!!
State.Name: Frost - Dogmeat resurrected

Original.Name: FROST Restore Eleanor as Vendor - v1.0 - ESP with ESL Flag-39807-1-0-1562112442.zip

State.Author: RedRocketTV
State.Description: A patch for FROST: Restores the NPC Eleanor, a vendor at an unmarked location, to her vanilla role as a merchant from the hostile survivor she is in FROST.
State.Name: FROST - Eleanor Restored as Vendor

Original.Name: FROST - Exterior Cell Fixes and FPS Boost-54950-1-1-1635850866.7z

State.Author: krrptd
State.Description: FROST is a massive overhaul and touches nearly every cell in the game. This resulted in many precombines and previs issues (with severe FPS drops). Complementing my "FROST - Interior Cell Fixes" and fully replacing "FROST - Unofficial Boston FPS Fix", in content and quality.
State.Name: FROST - Exterior Cell Fixes and FPS Boost

State.Author: krrptd
State.Description: FROST is a massive overhaul and touches nearly every cell in the game. This resulted in many precombines and previs issues (with severe FPS drops). Complementing my "FROST - Interior Cell Fixes" and fully replacing "FROST - Unofficial Boston FPS Fix", in content and quality.
State.Name: FROST - Exterior Cell Fixes and FPS Boost

State.Author: Storm
State.Description: A patch to fix the erroneous interactions of FROST's Fungal Purge with Chemist and Medic, and turns it into a DoT that can be negated by Med-X or Antivenom.
State.Name: FROST - Fungal Purge Patch

Original.Name: FROST - Give Me That Bottle Patch v1.3-28807-1-3-1547401931.7z

State.Author: Grohikk
State.Description: For compatibility between naugrim04's FROST Survival Simulator and Zzyxzz's Give Me That Bottle Mod. Ensures all of GMTB's functionality while keeping intact all of naugrim04's value changes and item characteristics such as no healing and sanity changes. v1.3 fixes all item weights and bottle cap returns.
State.Name: FROST - Give Me That Bottle - Patch

State.Author: krrptd
State.Description: Ferals are ugly mofos, but still I prefer to see their faces instead of that void with floating hair. Heads of dead feral ghouls are now returned to their respective owners. No more bugged dead actors.
State.Name: FROST - Headless Dead Ferals Fix

State.Author: undernier
State.Description: Updates 30+ locations so they look like humans could actually survive in them.
State.Name: FROST - Hunkered Down - Commonwealth Overhaul

State.Author: undernier
State.Description: Updates 30+ locations so they look like humans could actually survive in them.
State.Name: FROST - Hunkered Down - Commonwealth Overhaul

State.Author: Outcognito
State.Description: This mod changes several face masks and helmets worn by survivors to actually protect them from atmospheric radiation.
State.Name: FROST - Immersive masks

Original.Name: FROST - Interior Cell Fixes and Previs Repair-48425-2-2-1635542521.7z

State.Author: krrptd
State.Description: FROST is a massive overhaul and touches nearly every cell in the game. This resulted in many precombines and previs issues (white voids, flickering objects). Consider those fixed now.
State.Name: FROST - Interior Cell Fixes

State.Author: krrptd
State.Description: FROST is a massive overhaul and touches nearly every cell in the game. This resulted in many precombines and previs issues (white voids, flickering objects). Consider those fixed now.
State.Name: FROST - Interior Cell Fixes

State.Author: undernier
State.Description: "It snowed! I love snow; it makes everything beautiful. Not like that horrible black rain; It took half my hair last time; half of what was left anyway; It's more like scabs now. I hate the rain! ... and people too! Especially those cultists cannibals up north; they took my arm last month; but I'll get them. I hope it snows more soon." - Survivor.
State.Name: FROST - It Snowed - Winter Textures

Original.Name: FROST - M1 Garand Patch and Replacer-53347-1-1-1627359524.7z

State.Author: kjg92 and RedMetalShield
State.Description: Alters asXas's M1 Garand to adhere to FROST's balance changes with an option to replace the vanilla Pipe Bolt Action
State.Name: FROST - M1 Garand Patch and Replacer

State.Author: kjg92
State.Description: Alter's noniac's M1928A1 Thompson to adhere to FROST's various changes and replaces the vanilla submachine gun.
State.Name: FROST - M1928A1 Thompson Replacer

State.Author: lake
State.Description: Allows you to convert 10s to 1s in the chemistry lab
State.Name: Frost - Money convert

State.Author: RedMetalShield
State.Description: Adds 6 (+1 hidden) new starting locations for FROST, based on sheepswirl's "4th Door" mod for FROST.
State.Name: FROST - More Starting Locations

State.Author: Minotaur21
State.Description: NPCs in FROST are no longer limited to the amount of ammo in their inventories.
State.Name: FROST - NPC Ammo Tweak

Original.Name: FROST - NUCLEAR WINTER COMPATIBILITY PATCH FULL-42340-1-3-1595792377.zip

State.Author: Minotaur21
State.Description: Compatibility patch so that Fallout 2287 - Nuclear Winter works properly with the weather, armor, and locations from FROST Survival Simulator.
State.Name: FROST - Nuclear Winter Compatibility Patch

State.Author: RedMetalShield alias Redawt
State.Description:
FROST - Nuka World is a patch that adds Nuka-World to Naugrim04's FROST Survival Simulator. 

It contains balance changes, new lore (with notes and journals), new factions and introduces a hallucination system similar to DUSTs Hallucination system!
State.Name: FROST - Nuka World AddOn

Original.Name: FROST - Riot Shotgun Patch and Replacer-52636-1-0-1629346883.7z

State.Author: kjg92 and RedMetalShield
State.Description: Alters Cumble's Riot Shotgun to adhere to FROST's various changes with an option to replace the vanilla Combat Shotgun.
State.Name: FROST - Riot Shotgun Patch and Replacer

Original.Name: FROST - DP Service Rifle Patch and Replacer-53072-1-0-1628315587.7z

State.Author: kjg92 and RedMetalShield
State.Description: A patch to make Deadpool2099's Service Rifle consistent with FROST in terms of balance and lore with an option to replace the vanilla Assault Rifle.
State.Name: FROST - Service Rifle Patch and Replacer

State.Author: Grohikk
State.Description: For immersive compatibility between naugrim04's FROST Survival Simulator and FLipdeezy's Smokeable Cigars - Cigarettes - Joints - With HardCore Auto Save Mod. Ensures all of SCCJ's functionality while integrating all of naugrim04's changes and characteristics such as sanity changes. Also provides an Alternate Version with DEFUI & VIS support.
State.Name: FROST - Smokeable Cigars - Cigarettes... - Patch

State.Author: undernier
State.Description: Adds snow that (mostly) doesn't clip through buildings.
State.Name: FROST - Snowy Weathers

State.Author: RedMetalShield
State.Description: This is a patch of the mod "The Marshland DLC" from Zorkaz for FROST.
State.Name: FROST - The Marshland DLC Patch

State.Author: Me
State.Description: Renames, balances or disables elements from the three workshop DLCs to fit the lore and the gameplay from FROST.
State.Name: FROST - Workshop DLC Patch

State.Author: ThyPride
State.Description: This mod integrates the healing mechanics of Agony into Frost Survival Simulator and builds upon both.
State.Name: Frost and Agony

State.Author: Legatt
State.Description: This patch allows you to use Winter Overhauls textures, while maintaining Frost's weathers and radiation damage.
State.Name: Frost and Winter Overhaul Weather Patch

State.Author: chacomain
State.Description: Fixes an annoying bug of the Armored Alliance Fatigues that hides your pip-boy.
State.Name: FROST Armored Alliance Fatigues Pip-boy Fix

State.Author: sheepswirl
State.Description:
Allows horrible people to harvest babies for food.

You're a monster.
State.Name: Frost Baby fix

State.Author: RedMetalShield
State.Description: This mod properly patches the mod "Crossbows of the Commonwealth" for FROST.
State.Name: FROST Better Crossbow Weapon Patch

State.Author: CrimsonLegion94
State.Description: Edits the new food items to effect your sanity. That's it. Warning: May cause a surplus of food supply.
State.Name: Frost Commonwealth Chickens and Rabbits

Original.Name: FROST Downtown Linked Workbenches v1.0 - ESL flagged ESP-39619-1-0-1561203501.zip

State.Author: RedRocketTV
State.Description: This small patch for FROST adds additional workbenches to the Downtown and Valenti Station cells, and links them all together to shared safe storage.
State.Name: FROST Downtown Linked Workbenches

State.Author: MidnightPurple
State.Description:
!!!FROST SURVIVAL SIMULATOR REQUIRED!!!



This mod allows Frost players to change their faction to one of 5 preset groups.
State.Name: FROST Faction Changer

State.Author: CrimsonLegion94
State.Description: A simple change to GMoW filter recipe to make it one to one with a more realistic component lists.
State.Name: Frost Filter Patch

State.Author: Lucasdb14
State.Description: Requires FROST Survival Simulator. A quick mod that allows you to make "fungal stew" out of glowing fungus and dirty water.
State.Name: Frost Fungal Stew

State.Author: MidnightPurple
State.Description:
!!!REQUIRES FROST SURVIVAL SIMULATOR!!!

This mod gives a few less "harsh" adjustments to the fusion core in Frost. Details inside...
State.Name: FROST Fusion Core Rebalance

State.Author: Telvan
State.Description: A small fix for FROST that disables the no settlements requirements for the Lone Wanderer perks to deal with automatically added settlements.
State.Name: FROST LoneWanderer perk fix - remove no settlements requirements

State.Author: Argonn - Alison - naugrim04
State.Description: Killing NPCs in FROST no longer result in a universal 2 sanity loss. Because you shouldn't feel as guilty killing a mad cannibalistic cultist compared to another guy that just wants to survive in the wasteland.
State.Name: FROST Lore-Tweaked Sanity Loss

State.Author: Me
State.Description: Fixes the non-vats weapon accuracy debuff in Frost, setting things back to default.
State.Name: Frost Mod Mod - scoped plus iron sight accuracy fix

State.Author: RedMetalShield - Redawt
State.Description: Patches the mod NPCs Travel for FROST.
State.Name: FROST NPCs Travel

State.Author: ResGestaeIV
State.Description: The mod is designed exclusively for FROST in order give it a second chance for it to be played with less bugs, more content and more immersion.
State.Name: FROST Plus v0.4.9 (WIP)

State.Author: MidnightPurple
State.Description: This is a small patch that allows the player to filter atmospheric radiation with power armor helmets the same way a gas mask does. This also includes the perception -2 debuff.
State.Name: FROST Power Helmet Rad Fix

State.Author: CrimsonLegion94
State.Description: A small patch that makes Salvage Rewards put shipments in Steamer Chests along with Frost's changes to them.
State.Name: Frost Salvage Rewards Patch

State.Author: chacomain
State.Description: Adds a Frost Sanity Tab to the PipBoy
State.Name: FROST Sanity Tab

State.Author: RedMetalShield
State.Description: Adds a survival kit (=portable crafting station) to FROST.
State.Name: FROST Survival Kit

State.Author: naugrim04
State.Description: FROST is a hardcore total conversion mod set in the years following the Great War of 2077 that aims to eliminate all vanilla quests and NPCs to create a freeform survival experience.
State.Name: FROST Survival Simulator

State.Author: CrimsonLegion94
State.Description: This adds the hacked goggles and visors to the general metro populace along with the tactical set added to the US Remnants. West Tek has finally come to the metro factions for a whole new flavor of warfare.
State.Name: Frost Tek

State.Author: Redawt alias RedMetal Shield
State.Description: This mod continues the development of the FROST Survival Simulator from Naugrim04, with bug fixes, removal of oversights, balancing, and the addition of new things (Hallucinations system, journals, items,...).
State.Name: FROST Unofficial Updates

State.Author: Dexials
State.Description: Standalone mod now, will make all survivors now give a warning
State.Name: FROST Warnings Will Be Given

State.Author: CrimsonLegion94
State.Description: Ever wanted to roll play has a Federation soldier or maybe even as an Alliance dog, but their armors were just a tad bit weaker than other options? Well never fear, for this is the fix you needed!
State.Name: Frost Weaver

Original.Name: Give Me That Bottle - DLC (Requires Far Harbor)-13193-2-6a.zip

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Ever wondered that you drink a beer for example and the bottle is magically gone? With the new survival mode you could use the bottle to get some water! But how to get this bottle!? Give Me That Bottle fixes that and gives a bottle in return! This mod adds new water bottles and cooking recipes to turn your dirty water into purified wate
State.Name: Give Me That Bottle

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description: HUDFramework is a UI framework that makes it possible for mods to add new UI elements to the HUD.
State.Name: HUDFramework

State.Author: futoshisan
State.Description: Let's graduate from cannibalism which eats the corpse as it is. Because you are not a Ghoul.
State.Name: Human Cooking

State.Author: Elzee
State.Description: 80+ kinds of grab attacks for fun.
State.Name: Human Grab Attacks

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Not too much, and not too little, Icepick aims to be a (mostly) realistic winter overhaul for Fallout 4!
State.Name: Icepick Overhaul

State.Author: Maduin81
State.Description:
This mod enables fast travel to Settlements only while in Survival Mode.  



There are now three versions -

Realistic - Fast travel only works from settlement to settlement and only with supply lines connecting the settlements

Restrictive - Fast travel to Sanctuary Hills, Home Plate, and The Castle from anywhere.

Easy -
State.Name: JOURNEY - Survival Settlement Fast travel

State.Author: Elzee
State.Description: Add grunt voices and controller vibration for player jump.
State.Name: Jump  Grunt

State.Author: Kaethela
State.Description: Originally designed to make perk requirements from Some Assembly Required visible, this mod lets you repair power armor using repair kits. Includes optional support for Creation Club and mod-added power armor. All ESL-flagged ESP files.
State.Name: Kat's Power Armor Repair Kits

State.Author: AGodComplexPikachu CurioNC EmissaryOFWind JTesmer ANiceOakTree Kirse10 imAarwyn Robberfox RoboAsimov TrophiHunter Wendera
State.Description: A mod that adds hundreds of new options to customize your character such as face paint, tattoos, scars, makeup, brows, haircolors, etc~!
State.Name: Looks Menu Customization Compendium

State.Author: Expired6978
State.Description: Adds a mirror to the workshop that will bring up the looks menu when you use it.
State.Name: Looks Mirror

State.Author: Expired6978
State.Description: Adds engine modifications to improve character creation.
State.Name: LooksMenu

State.Author: krisser143 aka WunderWafflen
State.Description: Some tattoo overlays for LooksMenu. It doesn't at all require Unique Player, and works more or less out of the box. A lot of customization is possible.
State.Name: LooksMenu Body Tattoos (CBBE) (EVB or vanilla)

State.Author: asXas
State.Description:
Adds a standalone M1 Garand to Fallout 4.



**PING**
State.Name: M1 Garand - A WWII Classic

State.Author: NWI - Noniac - Wardaddy - Ricoginger
State.Description: Tired of seeing the Vault Boy with that thompson thats missing in every fallout since FO2? I'm here to address that. Thompson M1928A1 variant, fully animated with plenty of attachments. Ported from the awesome Day of Infamy by New World Interactive, the studio behind their other more popular title Insurgency.
State.Name: M1928A1 Thompson - Day of Infamy

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Save, load, transfer, import and export all your MCM settings at once. Transfer settings between savegames, backup your favorite settings, or send your settings to another user!
State.Name: MCM Settings Manager

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Before their untimely fall, the Minutemen set up Watchtowers around the Commonwealth to keep an eye out from above. Unfortunately, the Minutemen crumbled before the Watchtower's Project was finished, so now the completed ones lay dormant, scattered across the Commonwealth. Each tower contains some loot left behind from the days of the Minutemen.
State.Name: Minuteman Watchtowers

State.Author: Spandrel
State.Description: The main file is a natural, immersive alternative to vanilla night vision, active on the first Night Person perk, that is both triggered and moderated by the light level on the player character. There are also a dozen or so other mods in the optional and miscellaneous files, at least a few of which are worth the trouble of downloading.
State.Name: Adaptive Night Vision - Salvage Rewards - Auto Storage Containers - Other Stuff

Original.Name: More Feral Ghouls. A Zombie Mod-43441-0-9-1581441117.rar

State.Author: Oynlen and DeathByKitty
State.Description: Mod adds more types of feral ghouls, some of them might be unique and have notes in their equipment.
State.Name: More Feral Ghouls. A Zombie Mod

State.Author: Oynlen and DeathByKitty
State.Description: Mod adds more types of feral ghouls, some of them might be unique and have notes in their equipment.
State.Name: More Feral Ghouls. A Zombie Mod

State.Author: CrimsonLegion94
State.Description: This patch makes More Feral Ghouls, A Zombie Mod fall in line with Frost's changes to ghoul's body changes and radiation aura. Tested and seems to be working.
State.Name: More Ghouls For Frost

State.Author: Delicon20
State.Description: Mutant Menagerie fills the Commonwealth to the brim with all new creatures gathered from a wealth of public access sources. These new, lore-friendly creatures come with unique drops and hand-placed spawns. This mod also adds in dozens of dynamic spawns for new, vanilla, and DLC creatures alike!
State.Name: Mutant Menagerie - Big Game Hunting

State.Author: battousai5150
State.Description: this mod removes junk items, caps, weapons, armors, mysterious candy, etc. from Mutant Menagerie's leveled lists for those that prefer more realistic loot drops. There is also a patch for the wasteland exotics patch that adds Mojave Mantises, Mojave Geckos, Lamprey Floaters, Institute Centaurs, and the Famished.
State.Name: Mutant Menagerie realistic loot patch

State.Author: Astroblood
State.Description: A mod for FROST Survival Simulator to increase plausibility and immersion with the cooking and processing of mushrooms.
State.Name: Mycophagy - A FROST Survival Simulator addon

State.Author: skyquest
State.Description: Adds over 300 NPC's who traveling the Commonwealth, Far Harbor, Nuka-World.
State.Name: NPCs Travel

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Full featured MCM settings menu for NPCs Travel
State.Name: NPCs Travel - MCM Settings Menu

State.Author: kjg92
State.Description: A Patch for FROST and the replacer version of See Through Scopes.
State.Name: Patch - FROST and See Through Scopes (Replacer Version)

State.Author: AKcelsior
State.Description: Turn your radial Pip-Boy light into a directional flashlight!
State.Name: Pip-Boy Flashlight (Pipboy - Power Armor - Lamp Overhaul)

State.Author: Mandragorasprouts
State.Description: Polluted Climate - Winter Edition
State.Name: Polluted Climate - Winter Edition

Original.Name: Ponytail Hairstyles by Azar v2_5a - BA2 version-8126-2-5a.zip

State.Description: New standalone hairstyles for your characters.

Original.Name: Professional Ammo Crafting - All DLCs Included (No AWKR Dependency)-22175-3-2-1629166812.rar

State.Author: Edmond Noir
State.Description: Immersive realistic ammo crafting and breakdown at the Chem Station, or optionally at the AWKCR workbench - includes all DLC ammo types and a optional file which requires none of the DLCs, and provides support for WEAPON SMITH EXTENDED,  LOADS OF AMMO.
State.Name: Professional Ammo Crafting (P.A.C)

State.Author: Ruddy88
State.Description: Simple Sorter is a FO4Edit script that will automatically add the text needed for icon replacements for all valid items in your entire load order. It automatically scans your mod list, loads all valid items to a new ESP, then detects what sort of item it is so that the correct icons are used. No more patches, no more manually patching.
State.Name: Ruddy88's Simple Sorter

State.Author: Mangaclub
State.Description: Radiant Clouds and Fogs replaces almost all Fallout 4 Clouds as well as the distant fogs in the mountains. It is available in Highres and Medres versions.
State.Name: Radiant Clouds and Fogs

Original.Name: Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul - ALL DLC-10189-1-6e.zip

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: Makes weapon sounds more realistic for player and NPCs. Improves and balances ambiance and reverb to be more realistic and lively.  Increases the diversity and dynamics of in-game sound.  Fixes numerous issues. Lightweight and compatible with all sound replacer mods.
State.Name: Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul

State.Author: The entire cast of the television show Friends
State.Description: Remake of the Riot Shotgun from New Vegas.
State.Name: Riot Shotgun (Fallout 4 Edition)

State.Author: Hitman and Wardaddy
State.Description: Adds custom animations to the riot shotgun.
State.Name: Riot Shotgun Animations

State.Author: Rutah - Neto
State.Description: Tattoo pack containing 47 overlays for LooksMenu created by Rutah, ported to Fallout 4 by me. Currently only compatible with CBBE female bodies.
State.Name: Rutah Tattoo Pack for LooksMenu (CBBE)

State.Author: henkspamadres
State.Description: Adds see-through (so no scope overlay) Combat Scopes to various weapons.

State.Description: This mod will add Service Rifle from Fallout New Vegas, based on legendary M16 platform, with completely scratch-made assets and animations

State.Description: Allows you to smoke Cigars, Cigarettes and Joints. Adds auto save on Hard core feature

State.Author: Jekod
State.Description: Adds a holotape that allows you to choose various options for survival difficulty, including hunger, thirst and exhaustion rate.
State.Name: Survival Options

State.Author: GhostFC3S
State.Description: Hardcore First aid mod where every gun shot causes a bleed effect over time. New medical supplies to heal and keep the player alive.
State.Name: Survival First Aid

State.Author: donngold
State.Description: Adds more voices to survivors in "Frost"
State.Name: Survivor Voices-Frost

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description: New gameplay mechanic - 3rd person cover system! Take cover behind objects and automatically lean out to shoot when you aim down sights. NEW: v1.1 BETA released - Dynamic Camera - you can now switch shoulders, double-tap forward key to enter cover/cover-vault, and transition smoothly from first-person to third for cover, then automatically back
State.Name: Take Cover

State.Author: darkconsole
State.Description: Automatically yank Fusion Cores out of power armor when you get out.
State.Name: Take Your Cores

State.Author: Dreivor
State.Description: Explore the limitless customization possibilities with highly immersive and realistic tattoos, featuring both overlays, overrides and eyeball tattoos as one extreme body modification. this modification project is also supported with free monthly updates that improve, add new things and evolve existing features.
State.Name: Tattoos Collection by Dreivor OVERLAYS Edition 921

State.Description: Lore-Friendly Feral Ghoul Audio Overhaul.

State.Description: Step into the Southern Marshlands. A place filled with toxic clouds, poisonous water and hallucinogenic plants

State.Description: Step into the Southern Marshlands. A place filled with toxic clouds, poisonous water and hallucinogenic plants

A mod that changes the sounds of the firearms in Fallout 4

This is a work in progress, more sounds will be added daily

State.Author: gargorias
State.Description: This is a comprehensive lighting mod that brings you many more shadow lights and a general improvement to overall lighting, ambience and fog to the interiors of the Commonweatlh, Far Harbor and Nuka World.
State.Name: Ultra Interior Lighting

State.Author: MEV4NS
State.Description: Patch to make Automatron fit into Naugrim's FROST mod.
State.Name: Unofficial FROST Automatron Patch

State.Description: Compatibility patch between FROST and Human Cooking.

State.Author: pauderek
State.Description: Weapon magazines and casings are now dropped and visible when reloading

State.Author: Limo
State.Description: This mod improves the default Fallout 4 haircuts by giving them a bit more contrast and variation.
State.Name: Wasteland Salon - Hair Texture Improvement Mod

State.Author: Seb263
State.Description:
Weapons of Fate is a mod that makes bullets behave in a more interesting and realistic manner.



Each bullet has unique characteristics that are combined to determine the trajectory that the bullet will follow.

Also, bullets no longer dissapear after a certain distance, instead losing in altitude until their point of impact.
State.Name: Weapons of Fate (Ballistics Overhaul)

Original.Name: West Tek Tactical Optics v2.0.1 (minor update)-12220-2-0-1.rar

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: Night Vision / Thermal / Targeting HUD goggles and eyepieces with new meshes and HD textures. Fully modular, craftable, upgradeable. 3 vision effects, 8 colors, and 2 additional targeting enhancements. Schematics posters also in the Workshop!
State.Name: West Tek Tactical Optics - Night Vision Thermal Vision Goggles and More

State.Author: flecked
State.Description: Winter pine trees are all around the Commonwealth
State.Name: Winter Commonwealth Pines

State.Author: MassShep
State.Description: Winter Overhaul
State.Name: Winter Overhaul

State.Author: flecked
State.Description: Retextures the Commonwealth, Far Harbor and Nuka World landscapes for Winter. Features interiors with NO white snow textures.
State.Name: Winter Redone

State.Author: flecked
State.Description: Retextures the Commonwealth, Far Harbor and Nuka World landscapes for Winter. Features interiors with NO white snow textures.
State.Name: Winter Redone

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: The Complex Sorter from FallUI Item Sorter Mod. Automatically add item tags to all items. Highly versatile and completely configurable: custom processing rules, custom tag sets, custom naming rules. You can just change anything to your liking. Standard rules support most custom mods out-of-the-box.
State.Name: M8r98a4f2's Complex Item Sorter

State.Author: 4estGimp
State.Description:
*Intended for a No-AWKCR build*

This mod is a collection of Quality of Life additions for M8r98a4f2's Complex Item Sorter.  It expands Icons, Item Sorting, and Rule-sets.  The Mod Manager download includes the 3 main Complex Sorter .ini files and 3 Inventory Sorting .xml files.  It works great alone or along with my other FallUI mods.
State.Name: 4estGimp - M8r98a4f2's Complex Item Sorter Enhancements

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which makes console menu show extra useful infomation about selected target,for example, target's name, ID, baseID, mod name and so on.This plugin also add some extra info lists to console to show selected actor's all kinds of info like factions, perks, active effects, actor values, equipments and so on.
State.Name: Better Console - F4SE

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for bullet counted reloads with most of the features such a system should have.
State.Name: Bullet Counted Reload System (BCR)

State.Author: Neanka
State.Description: clean all about CC from ur game interface
State.Name: CCCleaner

State.Author: Neanka
State.Description: rework of my old survival stats widget mod using f4se, which avoids any compability issues with any mods which modifiy HC_ManagerScript or HC_Manager quest
State.Name: DEF_SSW Survival Stats widget redone

Original.Name: DEF_UI Iconlibs Rescaled and Fixed - Colored-31088-1-6-1575705975.7z

State.Description: Aims to bring consistency in design and coloring to the icon library. Also fixes various issues with icon sizes, bounding boxes, and scaling.

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: This is FallUI - Inventory. A optimized Fallout 4 inventory interface for PC.

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: A highly configurable HUD. Every widget can be positioned and configured. Configure your design in the in-game layout manager in MCM. Layouts can be shared and imported too.
State.Name: FallUI - HUD

Original.Name: FROST Lore-Tweaked Sanity Loss v2.2 Script-53024-2-2-1629737222.rar

State.Author: Argonn - Alison - naugrim04
State.Description: Killing NPCs in FROST no longer result in a universal 2 sanity loss. Because you shouldn't feel as guilty killing a mad cannibalistic cultist compared to another guy that just wants to survive in the wasteland.
State.Name: FROST Lore-Tweaked Sanity Loss

State.Author: Neanka
State.Description: new LevelUpMenu which also allow to add brand new perks into game, remove any classic perks and even add skills system into game
State.Name: LevelUpMenuEx

State.Author: reg2k - Neanka - shadowslasher410
State.Description: The Mod Configuration Menu is a settings page for mods! It provides a central location for mod configuration, accessible via the Pause menu.
State.Name: Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: Neanka
State.Description: framework which allow to add different new tabs into pipboy to track any actor values or global variables
State.Name: PipboyTabs

State.Author: TheLich
State.Description: Place/build objects in settlements everywhere you want, change objects whatever you like. No more RED!
State.Name: Place Everywhere

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description: A F4SE plugin that lets you jump from vertibirds.
State.Name: Vertibird Jump

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Three animated winter menus
State.Name: Winter Main Menu Animated  - For snowy and frosty players

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: Provides version independent IDs used for dynamically relocating offsets at runtime.
State.Name: Address Library for F4SE Plugins

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: It's like buffout but for the engine
State.Name: Buffout 4

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for showing holstered weapons on characters, with various customization options.
State.Name: Classic Holstered Weapons System (CHW)

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: This mod adds new commands and overhauls existing commands within the console.
State.Name: Console Commands Extender

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description:
A F4SE plugin that allows you to disable the hardcoded, vision-obscuring shader effect at various workbenches so you can actually see what you're crafting.



Also allows you to change the shader effect for the Power Armor station and robot workbenches to a outline-only shader instead of a full shader.
State.Name: Crafting Highlight Fix

State.Author: reg2k
State.Description: Faster Workshop is an F4SE plugin that optimizes workshop loading times by replacing some of the most expensive and inefficient regions of workshop loading code with far more efficient versions. Also provides a hotkey to instantly enter Workshop mode and fixes workshop icon load lag.
State.Name: Faster Workshop (Workshop Lag Fix)

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Preconfigured .ini for Classic Holstered Weapons System to use with FROST Survival Simulator, that excludes the CTD causing torch.
State.Name: FROST - Classic Holstered Weapons System (CHW) PreConfig .ini

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Untie the game speed from the framerate. Fixes physical bugs. Reduces loading time.

Now there is a separate version for VR.
State.Name: High FPS Physics Fix

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: F4SE plugin to stop the inventory menu automatically showing after unlocking a container. Also stops doors opening when picked.
State.Name: No Lockpick Activate (F4SE)

State.Author: Karandra
State.Description: Speeds up game start by storing INI files in memory instead of opening, parsing and closing the file each time some value from it is needed.
State.Name: PrivateProfileRedirector F4 - Faster game start (INI file cacher)

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Fixed crashes caused by Weapon Debris setting



Исправление вылетов при включенной настройке "Осколки от выстрелов"
State.Name: Weapon Debris Crash Fix

State.Description: Knocked down in combat? And get up like a sloth?  No! Be a soldier!

State.Author: humannature66 and Xazomn

This mod replaces the teeth in your game.

The teeth-line is changed to accentuate the front- and corner-teeth, and Xazomn's photorealistic teeth-texture adds shine and wet shimmer.

State.Description: Changes the nasty facial moles to ones that are more commonly seen and nicer looking.

State.Author: epsadin
State.Description: This is an extended version of the amazing Barefoot Footstep mod. It adds barefoot sounds to metal, carpet and vault floor materials, as well as modifies stone / concrete and sand ones. This mod also adds barefoot sneaking sounds to all of the above. Credit goes to the user GrozaTerroristow, who is the author of the famous original mod.
